title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Define the specific requirements for the drone transport system in urban and rural areas, including autonomy, delivery zones, payload capacity, safety regulations, and environmental considerations.

title: Design Drone Hardware and Software Architecture
description: Create a detailed design for the drone hardware and software architecture, including drone body design, propulsion systems, navigation systems, communication systems, payload systems, and power management.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for Drone Control and Monitoring
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for controlling and monitoring drones, including drone status, location tracking, payload management, and safety features.
dependencies: Design Drone Hardware and Software Architecture

title: Develop Backend Systems for Drone Management
description: Create backend systems to manage drones, including fleet management, delivery routing, safety monitoring, and data analysis.
dependencies: Design Drone Hardware and Software Architecture

title: Implement Database for Drone Operations Data Storage
description: Create a database to store drone operations data, including flight logs, delivery status, customer information, and system performance metrics.
dependencies: Develop Backend Systems for Drone Management

title: Configure DevOps Pipeline and Deployment Strategy
description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline for the drone transport system, including automated testing, code review, and deployment to production.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for Drone Control and Monitoring
Develop Backend Systems for Drone Management

title: Perform Quality Assurance Testing on Drone System
description: Test the drone system thoroughly to ensure it meets all requirements and can operate safely in various environments.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for Drone Control and Monitoring
Develop Backend Systems for Drone Management
Implement Database for Drone Operations Data Storage
Configure DevOps Pipeline and Deployment Strategy

title: Review Design Documents and Implementation Code
description: Conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices, design guidelines, and security standards.
dependencies: Design Drone Hardware and Software Architecture
Develop Frontend Interface for Drone Control and Monitoring
Develop Backend Systems for Drone Management

title: Audit Security Compliance of the Drone System
description: Assess and improve the security compliance of the drone transport system, ensuring it follows industry standards and best practices.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for Drone Control and Monitoring
Develop Backend Systems for Drone Management

title: Document Project Progress and Technical Aspects
description: Write technical documentation that describes the drone transport system, its features, usage, and maintenance.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for Drone Control and Monitoring
Develop Backend Systems for Drone Management
